sentences.english: During the past couple weeks, gold has had the Midas Touch.
sentences.chinese: 在过去几周里，黄金焕发着其点石成金的魅力。

sentences.english: The fable of King Midas is about a man who could turn things to gold.
sentences.chinese: 迈达斯国王的神话说的是一个能点石成金的人。

definition: lit. to change something rotten into something magical (idiom)
